tool_description: Retrieves current prices for specified products across multiple sales channels including online marketplaces, retail stores, and direct sales platforms.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs or IDs to retrieve prices for

channel_names.description: List of sales channel names (e.g., amazon, shopify, retail_stores)

include_promotions.description: Whether to include promotional prices in the results

error_messages: Invalid product IDs: One or more product IDs do not exist in the system.
Unknown channel: One or more specified channels are not configured or accessible.
Channel connection failed: Unable to connect to one or more channels due to network or authentication issues.
usage: Provide product_ids and channel_names arrays to retrieve current pricing data. Set include_promotions to false to exclude promotional pricing.

timestamps.description: Timestamps when prices were last updated
